content.detailedDescription:
A couple of weeks ago i had seen a bright planet looking light over the houses across the street that slowly moved away and light dimmed leaving only an outline of a transparent round object. this was the first ufo sighting that was completely different than all others.

since then i've been out gazing at the sky at all hours of night looking for moving or unusual objects. i normally see several satellites moving across the sky, which look like small stars moving at constant speeds. 

monday morning at 5:15am i was looking and i had been checking out satellite positions on the nasa satellite web site.  i was looking straight up when i noticed what first appeared to be a satellite moving from nw to se. as it passed what appeared to be a far away star the little light started following the bigger light at a slower speed. in addition to seeing the light it appeared to have an outline of an cigar shaped body that was mostly transparent except from the reflection from the bright moon. the cigar shape was towing the light behind it. it could only be seen briefly as it moved away from the light. 

ten minutes later i saw another solid bright light moving east to west at a similar speed as the first object. i was able to get a better idea of the height of this object as a fighter jet flying at high altitude with red lites flashing flew overhead. both the plane and the object appeared to be at similar heights over 40,000 ft. i had another high altitude jet fly by at the same height a few minutes later. both jets were flying in normal flight patterns of traffic at high altitudes maybe upwards 40,000 ft. higher than normal. i was able to see a slight reflection of the object where it wasn't lit up, that's how i new it was close to the height of the planes because i could see the unlighted bottom of the planes also.

i went back in to check the nasa site and there were no satellites flying over texas at anywhere near that time. so that would make them unidentified. this sighting wasn't nearly as dramatic as the one two weeks ago but very interesting. i have no doubt the past sighting was from something out of this world. the memory is burned into my mind.
content.summary: Several satellite looking objects moving in various directions at 50,000 ft

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i go out for our late walk for our dog between 10:30 and and 11pm. for the last three nights we have had multiple ufos and types, sizes, paths, you name it it seems we have had it. sunday night we had two different types of ufos, one a set of 6-8 small square dull white colored objects headed from northeast to south east. they were irregular in size and shape but square is the closest i can make them to be. just north of where we were standing on our street (which goes north to south) the group of white objects stopped suddenly and until i looked east i saw the diamond shaped craft with the multiple colored lights that we have seen recently has heading north east to north west. the group proceeded south from there in a quick speedy basis. the diamond shaped one headed on west in supersonic speeds, none of them seem to be aware of each other last night i took our dog out for his walk around the same time and i observed a blimp shaped object flying really fast from south to north, it was doing corkscrew type fight path it had rectangular windows along the sides that changed from white to red to yellow and back to white blinking off between light colors and all windoows apeared to change color at the same time. tonight our local object was running all over the place as if he was challenging them to come back. other than our local one there were no other visable ufos in our area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo's seen over several nignts, activity here is really pick up size movement and type

content.detailedDescription: Looking nw i saw what appeared to be a star or sattelite but was to low to be either, i called out to my wife and she came to observe from inside our home. it continued in a straight line to the se at high rate of speed, just a bright light with no other lights. it looked and moved like nothing ive seen before, the speed was too fast.  lost visual behind trees as it appeared to be headed to the san diego area.
content.summary: Bright light resembling sattelite no other lights, orb like moving at fast rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
What brought this back to me is your wallpaper  their out their i was camping with my buds not one of them ever said anything to me  and we had a  cple but  i rember the trees and this light that came from the top  of the trees this light was fixed on me the more i think about it the less i rember but i do get flashes of the tree and that light coming from the top of the tree i just rember that image with out the ets in it just alight on the top of a tree and i find it creepy i thought one of my freinds was inthe tree at the top pionting a flash light at me a flsh light beam coming from the top of a tree the object was stationary my feeling was i was scarded and i keep coming back to this piont in time
 the reason why im telling u this is that the 2nd image caught my attion if u r doing some type of study this one struck a nerve i reported this once before and some one called me and i kinda down played it plus it was my daughter bd and i had compnay over i nvr heard from him again i have no evedice or proof just a messed up memory but what i do know is i dont like the second wallpaper and i dont have any memories of ets in the wall paper just a light coming from the top a tree like a helicopter without the wind effect or noise
content.summary: Kinda went to side of hill then looked up into a bright light  coming from top of trees

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my daughter to my mothers house. we both saw a bright blue white object moving south east. there was no sound. we could see other aircraft near by to compare the object to. i was in the civil air patrol and could clearly see this was not an aircraft. this was not landing lights, i know the difference between landing lights and what we saw. the light pulsed becoming darker blue, there seemed to be a distortion in the light then it just blinked out. i checked and could not find a satellite on the internet that could account for what we saw. this was not a meteor or at least it did not have a tail nor did it descend at an angle as i have witnessed meteors before. not sure what was but it was not venus, mars or swamp gas. my real hope was it was simply a satellite.
content.summary: Bright blue white light moving south east. no sound, could see air planes heading in to philly to compare object

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend decided to go to foothill college's observatory. after we realized it was close, we sat in the parking lot for a while deciding what else we could do. we star gazed for a little and saw this star moving closer and closer. it was moving very slowly and there was no sound so we assumed it was far away. we thought it was a plane until we realized it was actually very close and there were no blue or red lights on it. there was no sound at any time during the encounter. it travelled in a straight line towards us from it's original place in the sky. it was at it's brightest before it decided to hover near us.

after it decided to stop and hover about 50-100 feet away from us. it seemed to be trying to communicate or send a message. my friend had a "connection" to it. whenever he took a step right it moved left. whenever he stepped left it went right. he did this about 3 times and i saw this very clearly.

we decided to approach it and get closer. as soon as we attempted this it ascended slowly and moved away slowly. there was absolutely no sound as it went around a mountain near to the observatory. unfortunately, we were not able to follow it and that was the last we saw of it.

i will never forget what happened. i felt excited and i wanted to get closer. i did have a little anxiety, but i was not scared. i was extremely curious!
content.summary: Star started getting closer and closer. after hovering near, it went behind mountain.

content.detailedDescription: Red ball or orb-like object observed traveling on a straight linear path at a slow or modest speed. after close to a minute, the object quickly changed direction at 90 degrees and traveled south at a very high rate of speed before it was out of visual.  general area where the orb was observed is just north of the ventura navy base and silverstrand beach.
content.summary: Red ball of light traveled on a straight-line path over channel islands marina/silverstrand area less than 500ft. above the water then land.  after a minute the object quickly changed direction south and vanished in seconds at a high-rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking outside earlier in the evening and some distance (a few miles away high up in the sky) i noticed a strange white light that kept appearing, sweeping across our direction seemingly sideways like a lamp in a light tower, and then disappearing, and then reappearing elsewhere a few seconds later only to do the same thing.  we saw this five or six times, wondered what it was, but went inside the building.  the light made no noise what-so-ever that we could here, but it was far away so we thought maybe it was a police helicopter.  now we don't think so anymore.

later that evening, my friend was standing outside, noticed light moving across the sky from west to east.  his phone was already in the camera app and so he pointed it up at the light clicked the zoom button and snapped the photo.  he came in and showed me the photo and i didn't know what to make of it, but after looking at this in the computer we see this was much much more than just a floating light.  the shape of the light and the flares coming off of it seem abnormal, like a stretched hexagon.  the source of the light can not be seen, even though this was the "super moon" night where the moon was supposed to be the biggest because it was as close to the earth as it ever gets on this evening/morning.  next to the light but seemingly floating independent from it there is a shiny milky colored or grey sphere.  

around the sphere is a reddish colored aura as if it is also eminating some kind of light radiation in an spectrum we can't see, but somehow affected the image sensor on the camera.  it is a possibility that the redness is lens-flare, but i've not seen lens flare from lights before.  we did a test with a bright light on the ground and the same camera phone looking directly at the light, unshaded and it did not produce any noticeable lens flare and did not blind the camera to anything beside or behind the light.  the light in the sky produced no noticeable noise although it moved much like a helicopter.  my buddy's room mate who was inside at the time had seen the same light earlier when we were out away walking fly over the apartment complex.  he said he was trying to sleep but then this brilliant white lights passed through all the windows in the building and there was no noise associated with the light.  the light had also very visibly upset the cat.
content.summary: Bright illuminating light appeared, flew west to east, disappeared without noise

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed an object in brantford, ontario at approx 11:45 pm. a friend and i were outside on his patio and i noticed a bright orange light flying over us. it seemed way too quick to be an airplane and the orange glow around it was very bright. i took a video on my phone but unfortunately, there is no zoom so on the video it just looks like an orange dot. we also noticed that the object seemed very silent. a plane went by in the opposite direction shortly after and you could tell it wasn't moving nearly as fast as the orange object. also this may be a coincidence but when we went back inside after the object had passed, the satellite tv had lost it's signal for a short time on an otherwise clear evening.
content.summary: The object seemed to be a orange/red glowing sphere, it was totally silent and moved very quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
-at approximately 21:45hrs edt, i felt a rumble from inside my house. when i exited the front door, looking up from the bottom of the steps, i observed a string of lighted objects which looked at first like helicopters without rotors at approximately 5,000 feet agl. 

-one by one they changed an easterly azmuth to a south by south east azmuth. each one making the turn southernly, in a straggled formation behind one another with approximately 1,000 yards spacing. 

-one headed due east about three miles and seemed to hover in observation of the others, another one was east, hovering in observation as well, but only a mile east of entire formation. all appeared to be at approximately 5,000 feet agl.

-it took about 10 minutes for them to ingress & egress my line of sight from west horizon to sse horizon.  

-as soon as they had made their egress, i noticed a slight rumbling sound, & observed overhead at my zenith position, three b-2 bombers one in front of the other about 2,000 ft apart following the formation south by south east. 

-just before disappearing over the horizon, they filed into a loose one-mile arrow-shaped formation.  i could only observe rear red beacons from each of the bombers. 

-i have observed the excessive sound from an entire flight of helicopters before. i have observed several b-2 bombers many, many times, and the sound of both is deafening, but these helicopters seemed to have no rotors, and made a buzzing rumble sound.  
-not enough noise to alert the dogs next door.
the b-2 bombers made a buzzing sound, and again not enough noise to alert the dogs next door.
-my attempt to film with my smartphone failed, as it just would not adjust to the light conditions.  seemed that neither of the recordings of these objects could be seen nor heard on my cellphone. this is highly irregular. only the lights from the house next door and only several of the objects appeared on both videos that i recorded.
content.summary: 20 object & 3 b-2 bombers followed

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking n on south kk whennotice what i thought was a flare. the object was traveling w towards my direction. it slowed to a stop and hovered for 20sec. there was no sound or smoke/vapor coming from it. from the distance of around 500ft it appeared to be 200-300ft from the ground. it appeared to be searching for something. it seemed to about the size of a small van. after hovering it turned back e and slowly ascended away from me at a slight angle until it disappeared into the hazy distance. the object had a burning quality shimmering between orange/red/yellow colors. it's shape orb-like and didn't alter much except for the fire-like shimmering. i felt compelled to walk towards it. may have just been curiosity, but it's almost like it was putting a question in my mind that i can't quite remember. i took a photo with my iphone. it's a little shaky and no ground reference is in the shot. i have enhanced slightly to make it less grainy. i have attached both copies.

the coordinates for the object when it hovered are approx:
42.992439 -87.881799
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange/red/yellow ball flew in from e, hovered 20sec, turned and ascended back e climbing at a slight angle.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my friend's house and at about 2:45 in the morning i left his room to look out the window. before the ufo i spotted came into view the cellphone towers were completely dark. however when the ufo came it seemed to drop something on the 2 cellphone towers as it passed. the object was a flashing red light which flashed every second of the 5 seconds i saw the object. after it disappeared the red lights it deposited on the cellphone towers went out at the same time. at first i thought it was nothing until it started blinking red. i was going down stairs to get a drink but my sighting mentally disturbed me. i quickly returned to my room and have never forgotten those 5 seconds. i still am disturbed by my sighting and am wondering what was in the object and where it ended up. this was my first out of 2 ufo sightings. the second one was disturbing also. now i am a believer!
content.summary: A flashing red orb traveling west to east and deposits a mysterious red light on 2 different cellphone towers and when the light disappeared, so did the red lights on the cellphone towers.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching television and i heard something outside on the porch deck. i thought maybe there was somebody outside. so i walked slowly over to the back door leading to the deck and checked to see if it was locked. it wasn't so i locked it. i then sat on the couch to look out the row of windows to see if someone was on the deck outside and then i looked  to see if somebody was in the yard behind our house. all of a sudden a beam of circular light appears 6 feet away from me onto the deck. it was about 1 foot in diameter. the beam was not like a flashlight or a dull porch light. it was bright white almost too bright i couldn't even see the color of the deck anymore. i watched one of our cats run around one of the lights as if it was scared. then another light appeared exactly the same as the first, the second beam of white light appeared about 3-4 feet from the first beam of light. they both were stationary, i just stared and i had no clue what these lights were, because i knew they were different than any lights i had ever seen. so i started looking up and the lights were coming from darkness in the sky right above the house. i knew what i was seeing was not possible or was very rare to ever happen, and then the thought of aliens and ufo popped in my head. i tried my best to study the beam of light and how it could be so perfect and straight. it was as if the light came from its source and then there was no trace of it leading to the circle itself but there it was a circular beam of white light. i watched the first light disappear, and after that i ran away from the windows.

 now that i think about it i have a theory of what this possibly was. what if there was aliens visiting earth and the beams were there to pick them up to beam or materialize the aliens back to the ship. the cat was scared so maybe the cat sensed or saw the aliens they could have been invisible and beamed up to the ufo. just like in star trek how the people would stand on the white circle to be beamed down to the surface of a planet.
content.summary: Ufo hovering above house, two straight beams of circular light not like a flashlight came from above house out of blackness.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw my wife looking out the bedroom window and questioned her about what she saw. she said there was a light in the north sky that had not moved for several seconds. i saw it and got my binoculars to get a closeup view. what i saw was 2 horizontal rows of 4 lights each. they were like :::: i also noticed what looked like a reflection off shiny metal around the lights. i handed the binoculars to her and she could not find the light. while i was trying to help her find it, i looked away for a few seconds. when i looked back, it was gone. she said she saw a blue flash near the ground and then the light was suddenly in the se sky. then it disappeared. 
i was excited to see what i believe was a ufo because i have been a believer for many years. my wife has always been skeptical and she was quite shaken about what she saw. i think her attitude may have changed.
i forgot to mention that when my wife first saw the lights with her naked eye she saw a different light pattern. ::   :: i hope you get the idea. 
                                         . .
                                          .
the lights were closer together, but this is the general pattern.
content.summary: We saw the lights from our bedroom window at about 11:45pm

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were wound up after a long day and needed to get out.  when we get together we are normally late night people , so even though we did a lot that day, we weren't very tired.  we went for a late night car ride and wound up at dan's rock, a fairly close mountaintop view place that some of the kids in town told us about.  they said the view would be fabulous, even at night. 

after a fairly long hike to the top we took in the view, which was impressive.  from where we were standing, which is the very top of the mountain, i could make out tree tops beyond the rocks, at the bottom.  the trees themselves are around 40', so it was easy to judge our elevation at around 1000'.  you can see over a very large valley  which leads to some homes and business' across the other side.  i would have loved to see it in daylight. although somewhat windy, it was very peaceful up there. 
 
at about 4:15 am, just as i was commenting that we should stay long enough to make the hike back down worth it, i noticed what appeared to be a very bright star.  my friend said "it's an airplane, see it's moving." and i agreed.  until it stopped movement, hovered in one spot for about 6 seconds, then turn about 40 degrees and sped off in a zig zag manner.  we both thought it was a little weird, and chalked it off to some military plane, or something like that.

only minutes later, we decided to have a cigarette before beginning the climb down, and just after lighting it, i saw a beam of red light all the way at the bottom of the chasm.  the red light appeared just like a 1/2 inch diagonal laser pointer dot that moved from left to right horizontally, approximately 5 inches over 1 1/2 seconds, then disappeared.  i saw it first, all the way at the bottom.  around 10 seconds later, it appeared again, identical in shape and size, about 150 feet higher than the first time.  i had no idea what it was.  

i called my friend's attention to it.  he looked over the side of the railing with me and sure enough, the light appeared four more times, rising in elevation 150 or so feet each time, lighting around every 10 seconds in the exact size time and shape as before.  it definitely changed path a couple of time on the way up, but was essentially a vertical ascent.  the light finally appeared at eye level, approximately 20 feet in front of us hanging directly over the chasm.

there was absolutely no noise, no outline of any kind, only the light.  we both got spooked, and just as i said "maybe we should get out of here," the light reappeared from eye level 20 feet away to eye level about 10 feet away.  we made our way out of there with due haste, and never saw it again.

i have been bugged by this over the last several years, and my friend and i always discuss our theories, but in all my research over that time i have never found a similar incident reported.  some say it was some joker with a laser pen on a balloon.  that would be easier to accept if it wasn't so windy and four o'clock in the morning.  really, would someone be out there at that hour, at the bottom of dan's rock just waiting for someone to show up so they can play a trick?  i just don't know.  but i would love to.  please advise if you have ever heard of a similar incident.
content.summary: 5" horizontal laser light rose from 1000' below us to eye level in 1 minute.  no sounds changed direction ascending.  flashed once every 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were looking at the night sky around 8:15 hawaii time from our backyard noticing all the stars out. we then noticed directly overhead a fast moving "star" going across the sky.It seemed to fly toward the north east. it was moving very fast. we first thought, could it be a satellite? the space station? we watched it disappear behind some clouds. we then went to the front yard and my boyfriend grabbed his pointer laser from in the house. we looked for it again where we thought it might be coming out from the cloud. then all of a sudden we saw another super bright very very fast moving "star" like light appear overhead and this one was moving north to south. it even seemed to change its direction of path as we watched it in awe. he shined his laser pointer on it in the sky and after a few seconds of having the laser on it, it completely disappeared from our sight. it didn't move behind a cloud like the first one, it just vanished. whatever those bright, incredibly fast moving objects were, it was definitely not a star.
content.summary: Bright star-like object moving super fast

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to check if decorative solar yard lights were charged up and on in front of yard at about 2245. sky was clear and i was admiring the few constellations i could see which is not often due to the city light pollution. what caught my attention was a black smudge moving north from the south in the sky but i thought it was possibly a smudge on my reading glasses so i removed them (i have 20/20 distant vision). as it passed quickly and silently overhead (at about the altitude of an aircraft) i could make out very dim blue/gray spheres of light on each side of it. it was a black triangle with round lights, barely visible, two on each side with one in the front for a total of five, but none on the rear. the rear of it was not defined. it happened too quick for an attempt to capture it on camera. i banged on my front door for a family member to come witness this with me, but it was too late. it happened within 30 seconds. it was very fast and silent and blended in with the evening sky and the lights did not become apparent until it began to pass away from me. it was troublesome to post this as i am not a ufo fanatic, however, i realize the importance of reporting these events and i find it hard to believe that this was man-made. i was in awe and not at all afraid.
content.summary: Black triangle with dim blue lights on each of two sides and one at the front, no lights on rear

content.detailedDescription: I was in living room when i noticed bright orange light. we bolted outside and were amazed. this bright sphere waznt pulsating at first, then it started pulsating and not to long after it simply went out....It was gone...Disappeared. it also flew quick...But not meteor quick. it was amazing......It was silent as well......This is my second siting in less than a year.....What is going on?
content.summary: Orange pulsating sphere

content.detailedDescription:
1.  we were in the backyard looking up at the sky for shooting stars.
2.  the object was glowing like fire.  it was traveling from southeast to the northwest.  we noticed it coming over a tree line in our backyard.
3.  we have absolutely no idea what the object was. we have never seen anything like it before.  it did not appear to be a meteor.
4.  the object was the color of fire....Like a glowing ember. it traveling in a straight line at a consistent altitude or risely slightly as it traveled to the northwest.  my guess is that the speed was the same as a small aircraft.  there was no side to side movement.  there was absolutely no sound.  it did not appear to be falling like a meteor.
5.  we both stood up from our chairs to watch it as it went over the house.  i mentioned to my husband that we should say out loud to each other what we just saw so that we did not forget.  our feelings were that of amazement and wonder.  
6.  the object traveled to the northwest until we could no longer see it from that distance.
content.summary: Observed a glowing object traveling in a straight line from the southeast to the northwest.  the cylinder shaped object glowed like fire.  appeared to be traveling in a straight line or slightly upwards.  did not appear to be falling like a meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside for our evening cigarette, star gazing as always. suddenly my boyfriend calls out that something flashed really bright in the southeastern sky. i immediately looked in the direction to see it begin to brighten into a flash that reminded us of a camera. it flashed/brightened at least 3 times while it moved towards the north, each one was made up of two quick succession flashes. after these flashes the orb would fade nearly until you couldn't see it against the night sky then would begin the cycle over again.

we noticed there were no bugs out when we first went out (10 mins prior) and after seeing the orb they came on really strong. not sure if there is a correaltion

once the orb got over the top of our building and we couldn't see it anymore i turn around towards the direction it came, and there was a plane 10 degrees to the right of the original path. 
once the plane went over the building we had to come inside the flies were insane.
content.summary: Bright pulsating orb

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my partner were flagging traffic for a highway maintenace project washing bridges near the teton county / sublette county line along u.S. 191.  the water truck had gone back for another load of water and we were waiting for them backed into a pull out listening to the last few minutes of rush limbaugh and eating our box lunch.

it was a clear blue wyoming sky with just 3 or 4 puffy normal looking clouds you could see change shape as they went down wind (south).

then i happened to see the object and said "what the f#@k is that?  it looked exactly like one of those parasail parachutes, white, the top maybe a bit brighter white than a normal parasail, and it cast a shadow on its underside like it was hollow on the underside.  it was about a quarter mile away from us and above the horizon of the red creek drainage, outlined in the blue sky.  a pilot of a parasail at that range, he and his rigging would have been clearly visible. my partner frantically tried to find his binoculars to no avail. it moved across the wind to the south west at a slow rate of speed, and went behind the mountain top.  we then drove up the highway to see if we could see where it went, but never got another look at it, as the trees were too tall.

i tried to theorize what it was.  "could it be a piece of plastic caught up in a up draft from a construction site?  no, it did not change shape of any kind, it just moved horrizontally across the prevailing wind, and out of sight.

then i remembered i had a cell phone and could have taken a picture.  as homer simpson says, 
" dough! !".My question to your site is "has anyone else seen something like this?"  











t
content.summary: It looked like a white parasail parachute, fully deployed, but no pilot.

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to go outside one evening around 8:30 9:00 pm i wheeled ouside
our lobby and stoped at an incline i leaned back to strech and thought i saw a lite up abouve in the sky. i leaned back a second time to have a better look. what i saw next scared the crap out of me, i looked around quickly for people there was no one. i yeld 2 or three times for attention. i then started to observe them. i remember wishing i had brought my phone to call police and was still qite frightend. i started straining to make details of the 3 sphears moving very slowly south. i estime the size to be 12 to 14 feet in diamiter, transparent and dimly aluminated. two were close together and slowly sircling each other the sircling slowed stoped then reversed direction. the third was farther away anf fallowed the other two. they were moving very slowly south 4 km per hour. no sound at all. i estimate they were about 80 to 100 feet from me almost directly over head at first. i looked around for people once more and was frustrated and still afraid. they slowly went behind the building next door. i thought of wheeling down to the street to fallow but it was dark and i was alone and just to afrade.
content.summary: 3 12' to 14' foot dimly aluminated transparent ball like. two manuvered

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the backyard watching the supper moon. i looked around and it looked like heiecopters coming toward me at first but the lights were differant and when they started up it was to fast and to high. the objects was a very bright yellow ornage that was flying horizonial and took off straight up until out of sight.They were flying in groups of two and four it seemed like  about a total of sixteen are so. i have good pictures and wittness of this flyng objects ever what it was.
content.summary: Groups of two and four total about sixteenbright yellow light flying horizonial and then straight up until out of sight all went up at the same location. seemed to fly in a triangler formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping, something woke me up for a second. i tried to go right back to sleep but my right hand was hurting. it started to hurt more and more, until it hurt severely. i sat up and looked at my hand under my phone light. what i saw made me say no no no, there was a pencil eraser sized incision in the middle of my palm the skin wasn't removed there was still a small like the point of a pencil sized piece of skin still attached to my hand. it had an orange liquid around the incision and a like liquid band aid shiny like glass, ultra transparent and clear liquid over it all the size of a dime. 
i couldn't believe what i saw. i had an overwhelming urge to go back to sleep i couldn't it hurt, i had to look at it again. i didn't want to look at it again. i looked at it again, i knew it was not normal. i knew this was serious and real. i tried to wake up my boy friend, i told him "get up!, there's a hole in my hand!" i was smacking his shoulder, he said "go back to sleep there is nothing wrong with you." he would not look at my hand. all i wanted to do was go back to sleep. i looked at it for the third time and just shook my head and said "this is nuts!, this is crazy! the cat must've did that." i laid back down and just would not believe what i was seeing. the overwhelming urge to go back to sleep prevailed. why i didn't take a picture, why didn't i wake anyone else up, why i didn't touch it. i don't know. it was unbelievable. i woke up the next morning not thinking of it at all, not remembering anything. until my boyfriend woke up, and said "oh yeah, (sarcastically) what happened to the hole in your hand?" all of a sudden i remembered it all, i looked at my hand immediately. not a trace of it was there. i know what i saw, and i don't think there has been a day since then that i don't think about it, worry about it, and am freaked out about it. i've tried telling a few close friends and family. they don't even want to hear it. they tell me it didn't happen. i know what happened, i know what i saw, i know it was real. it was a surgical perfect incision with strange liquid. i want to know what happened to me, if this has happened to anyone else. in finishing i wasn't not supposed to see that.
content.summary: Awakened by pain in my right hand upon looking circular surgical incision with orange liquid around it and a shiny glass liquid over it all.

content.detailedDescription: On june 13 about 2;30-3;00 i went in to soak my legs in the bath tub. i got in and laid back. there is a large window next to the tub and we keep the blinds at an angle so we can look out and see the sky. i was watching the birds outside and a passenger jet went over. we are over the takeoff pattern for sacramento airport for jets heading east. then about 2 minutes after the jet flew past i noticed a triangle object in the sky. at first i thought it might be a bird, however there was no division between the body and wings. this was just a triangle. also at the height it was, a bird wouldn't have seemed to be going so fast and its heading was perfectly straight. it looked to be about 3 times the height of the jets that fly over our house look to be. it was going from east to west so it was flying against the normal jet traffic, but like i said it was much higher in the sky. it was a dull slate gray or black in color, and it seemed to have a circle on the bottom. honestly i can't say it wasn't a b-117 fighter although i see jets of all types where we live and i have never saw a b-117.There are air force bases all around sacramento so i cant really count this out, but if it was a b-117 he was headed some where awful fast. the duration was about 3 seconds...
content.summary: Dull blackish triangle moving extemely fast near sacramento airport

content.detailedDescription: Well i live in kechi,ks and was wondering if anyone had reported seeing an object in the early hrs on june 24th.    this was approximately 1:oo am , if looking straight up it would have been 5 to 10 degrees to the south and 15 degrees to the west. i was letting the dog out, and looking at the stars when i noticed this object, which i do not think was in our atmosphere. it appeared to be in space, but had to be very large. there were 3 orange to amber lights, very bright. i watched it for 5 min or so, then wondered if my eyes were playing tricks on me. so i closed my eyes and counted to 60 very slowly, then looked again. lights were still there. so i watched for a few more minutes, then a smaller white light come out of it, flying straight north. with incredible speeds. it then made a u turn, and flew back to the 3 other lights. i am one of those skeptics from being in the military (usmc), knowing the gov and military have plenty of aircraft the public has no knowledge of. i believe that 99.99 percent of sightings is just unknown manned aircraft. but there is no way this could fall into that category. this was most definitely in space. and had to be extremely large.  i would be interested in hearing if anyone else had seen this object.         thank you,
content.summary: 3 very brightredish-orange lights, then a single white flew out to the north then came back inside the other 3.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out into the night on my porch and noticed something glowing in the trees in the back of the property. there are no street lights and it is very dark. the night was overcast. the object was hovering about 20 to 25 feet above the ground in a very treed area. there is nothing in the back of the property this is very rural with a lot of trees. it was glowing red and seemed to have some spots between the glowing lights meaning it was not dense. decided to take some pictures and went inside the house to upload them. the pictures reflected white glowing objects in different shapes, note, i was seeing a red glowing object not white it seemed it was performing tricks for me. i went back outside and took more pics and then it suddenly broke up into 3 smaller white objects and disappeared. the digital pic of #240 is really the most interesting and you may have to play with the zoom ect to get it in focus. i would really like some feedback on this please.
content.summary: Overcast skies, temp in the 60's, noticed a red glow in trees about 20 feet up from ground level in a heavily treed area. rural, no street lights. lasted about 20 minutes and it seemed to be performing acrobatics for me. left suddenly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck at about 2255 using my ipad when, out of my peripheral vision, i noticed what looked like an extremely bright meteor, gradually increasing in brightness to the southwest of my location (about 260-270 degrees azimuth).  it was about 45 degrees elevation, fairly close to saturn.  the sky was cloudless and smoke-free (for the first night in several due to various fires).  the moon was not directly visible from my location due to my roof-line. 

as i watched the object, it slowly decreased in brightness until it was invisible.  i thought, that's cool, i just saw a meteor that must have been headed straight towards me because it left no trail at all.  then less than a minute later, it showed up again a little farther north.  but this time i watched as it gradually and evenly increased from invisible to a tiny pinprick of light, then to it's full brightness and back again to invisible.  

at this point, i ran inside to get my girlfriend to come outside to witness it.  i told her to look up to where i guessed it would show up again, and sure enough, after about 10 seconds, it appeared again - exactly like the previous two times.  i had her run inside to get my binoculars, and while she was gone, it appeared one last time before it disappeared from view.  

at its maximum brightness, the object was much brighter than any object in the sky - brighter even than jupiter at its maximum brightest.  the object appeared to be traveling  north from around saturn towards ursa major and was completely silent.  also, it seemed to be traveling significantly higher and/or slower than commercial airplanes normally fly.  the color of the light was always brilliant white when visible.  finally, the object spent more time invisible than visible as it was traveling.   i've seen countless planes and helicopters around here (a couple miles southeast of the us air force academy) and have never seen one that had lights like this object.  i've seen satellites as well and this object appeared much, much brighter than any satellite i've ever observed.  the entire sighting lasted for about 3 minutes until it disappeared for good.
content.summary: Very bright light in southwest sky travelling north, regularly alternating between invisible and max brightness.

content.detailedDescription: As hovering,the light was moving and then faded away. it was joined with 3 objects acting as if they were search helicopters!
content.summary: 3 objects hovering

content.detailedDescription:
At 2100i was standing outside with my wife looking at the supermoon rising in the east, when i saw an unusual orange-reddish light  due nw that brighter than any stars or antenna masts markers in the sky. it was slightly moving n-nw , then stopped for about 45sec, then traveled se, then changed direction instantly moving nnw again, it was at an unknown distance, but no more than a mile or two away at a 45 degree angle. it's orange red color was steady for about 3 minutes while traveling nnw, then became a little dimmer as it changed direction south, then dimmed and resembled a star for a minute and was stationary, then became even brighter and began traveling nnw again. but not as fast as it was originally for about 2 minutes. the light then dimmed and resembled a star for about 3 minutes, then disappeared entirely. my home is directly above the landing path for barksdale afb, and being prior military and having b-52s and all kinds of other planes flying and approaching at all times of the day and night i a certain this was not a plane or jet. there is no jet engine or strobe light in the world that can put out the light we saw, or move and hover like this. my wife and i had our suspicions about the ufo, but on my way to work the next morning the local radio station kvki dj was talking all morning abouta ufo that approached barksdale afb airspace, the tower hailed it 3 times to no avail and dispatched fighters. who knows what they saw, but this area, particularly the afb has had numerous sightings over the past few years & with the base housing half of our nuclear bombs & missiles, why not come check it out? 

i have seen some weird things in my life in thesky as i work outside in remote locations, but nothing like this before.
content.summary: Aerial multiple-lights
